task.title: Running the spring integration test
task.shortdesc: The spring integration test is located in org.bundlemaker.itest.spring. It takes the spring framework (version 2.5.6) tohether with all depenencies as it's input and parses the source code as well as the byte code.

step.cmd: Download the spring framework and repackage it for the integration test.
step.info: For your convenience the spring integration contains an ant build file (and an associated launch configuration) that downloads the spring framework and repackages it for the integration test. To execute the launch configuration just execute the [org.bundlemaker.itest.spring] Prepare integrationtest launch configuration.
step.stepresult: After execution the launch configuration the project org.bundlemaker.itest.spring should contain a directory spring with the spring source and classes.

info.p: Once the spring framework is downloaded and repackaged, you can execute the Spring integration test. If you execute the test for the first time, you have to launch the [org.bundlemaker.itest.spring] IntegrationTest - Reparse configuration. This causes the integration test to parse all source and class files.

If you already have executed the Parse step, you can execute the [org.bundlemaker.itest.spring] IntegrationTest configuration. In this case the sources and binaries are not parsed but the depenencies are read from the database.

stepresult.p: As the result of the integration test execution, you have a target platform and several PDE plug-in projects that are contained in the destination folder.

step.cmd: Starting the GUI to inspect the workspace

info.p: You can start a new eclipse instance to inspect the exported PDE plug-in projects. Just execute the [org.bundlemaker.itest.spring] BundleMaker UI (Spring) launcher.

step.stepresult: As the result of executing the GUI, a new eclipse instance starts up that contains the generated projects. Please make sure that you set the generated target platform correctly (project spring.target contains a corresponding target definition file spring.target).
